PersonalStatement.text: Daniel Lamb, born on 1967-12-20, is a Female based in Lake Louishaven, Azerbaijan. She is Single and holds Turkish nationality. Currently working at Wagner-Davis.

WorkExperience.text: Systems Administrator at Castillo-Hancock from 2012 to 2018.
Senior Research Scientist at Wagner-Davis, 2018 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Business Administration from Riga Technical University
Master's in Engineering from Florida Atlantic University - Boca Raton

PersonalSkills.text: Problem-solving: Skilled in troubleshooting and optimizing complex systems.
Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys running marathons.
